title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 46.2 - Contents of petition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 46.2 - Contents of petition

State Regulations

The application shall describe in detail the nature of
the particular item or items under consideration and the circumstances which
warrant the treatment petitioned for, and the extent to which reserves are
available or have been utilized in respect to such items. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
46.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
